lore: Sulphurhound cavalry squadrons are aggressive shock troops and line-breakers. The loping, mechanical beasts breathe gouts of incinerating phosphor and disembowel the foe with slashing claws, while the elite Skitarii riders unload incandescent pistol fire as they smash through defence lines, before circling back for survivors.

faction: Line-breakers: Each time this unit ends a Charge move
select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6 for each model in this unit
adding 2 to the result if this unit started its Charge move within 6" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS BATTLELINE units. For each 4+
that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

otherAbilities.The Serberys Sulphurhound Alpha model is: phosphor blast pistol; sulphur breath; cavalry arc maul; clawed limbs.
otherAbilities.Every Serberys Sulphurhound model is equ: twin phosphor pistols; sulphur breath; clawed limbs.
